title: iam_builder schema
description: Schema for config files used by iam_builder

iam_role_name.description: The role name of the airflow job

external_iam_role.description: The ARN of an external IAM role to assume

write.description: write is either true or false, true for allowing Athena write access

is_cadet_deployer.description: is_cadet_deployer should be reserved only for the highly empowered cadet deployment task. Inappropriate for other roles.

glue_job.description: glue_job must be set to true to allow role to run glue jobs

secrets.description: secrets must be set to true to allow role to access secrets from AWS Parameter Store

read_only.description: A list of s3 paths that the iam_role should be able to access (read only).

write_only.description: A list of s3 paths that the iam_role should be able to access (write only).

read_write.description: A list of s3 paths that the iam_role should be able to access (read and write).

deny.description: A list of s3 paths that the iam_role should not be able to access.

kms.description: A list of kms key arns that the iam_role should be able to acces.

secretsmanager.description: A secret that the iam_role should be able to access.

read_only.description: A secret that the iam_role should be able to access (read only).

bedrock.description: bedrock must be set to true to allow role to interact with Amazon Bedrock.

cloudwatch_athena_query_executions.description: cloudwatch_athena_query_executions must be set to true to allow

role_duration_seconds.description: Max duration role can be assumed for in seconds
